Acquia Campaign Studio is available on the Acquia Digital Experience Platform.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great open-source email platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Mautic?
Mautic is a full-featured email marketing platform without the significant costs common to similar platforms. It works well and is well-maintained. It also comes with an API to support integration with other platforms. The community is helpful when there are problems or questions.

What do you dislike about Mautic?
You need access to a technical administrator to get everything set up properly, which is normal for a complete email solution like this. It can also take some time for bugs to get fixed as development relies on the open-source community. But, frankly, I've had the same issue with paid solutions.

What problems is Mautic solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mautic provides a scalable marketing automation platform without the huge costs. Most platforms charge based on number of contacts or number of email sends and get very pricey very quickly. Mautic gives marketing teams access to the tools needed to manage sophisticated campaigns for only the cost of technology.

initial_reviews.review_title: Fully featured marketing automation with all the benefits of open source
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Mautic?
Mautic is open source, so it is "free" to use, easily extensible via plugins or modifying the underlying code. You can choose exactly how your email is delivered for complete control of cost and deliverability. The community is thriving and growing and the project gets regular updates. The software itself is really powerful, with a more complete feature set than many of the commercial products out there.

What do you dislike about Mautic?
Bugs happen with most updates, but they are usually patched in the next minor release. The user interface is a little inconsistent and sometimes hard to follow for non-developer types. That said, we have trained quite a few non-technical folks to use Mautic effectively.

What problems is Mautic solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mautic serves as a marketing automation platform. As an agency, we offer Mautic hosting to our clients allowing them to invest in services instead of licensing fees.

initial_reviews.review_title: Mautic - The Best Open Source Enterprise Marketing Automation Software

Mautic is a highly robust and advanced Marketing platform.  It is not meant for an entry level marketer, but rather a seasoned marketer that understands how to harvest the most from the system.  It provides a wide range of modules, advanced user segmentation, multi channel outreach (emails, sms, push, onsite pop-ups), an excellent campaign builder (customer journey) and full ownership of your own data.

It is omni channel, so you can send emails, sms, push notifications and configure on site pop-ups.  You own the system.

What do you dislike about Mautic?
The e-mail builder is not the best.  It requires some advanced level of understanding

What problems is Mautic solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mautic is providing an open source marketing platform that gives you all the bells and whistles of an enterprise solution

all_reviews.review_title: Fully featured marketing automation with all the benefits of open source
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Mautic?
Mautic is open source, so it is "free" to use, easily extensible via plugins or modifying the underlying code. You can choose exactly how your email is delivered for complete control of cost and deliverability. The community is thriving and growing and the project gets regular updates. The software itself is really powerful, with a more complete feature set than many of the commercial products out there.

What do you dislike about Mautic?
Bugs happen with most updates, but they are usually patched in the next minor release. The user interface is a little inconsistent and sometimes hard to follow for non-developer types. That said, we have trained quite a few non-technical folks to use Mautic effectively.

What problems is Mautic solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mautic serves as a marketing automation platform. As an agency, we offer Mautic hosting to our clients allowing them to invest in services instead of licensing fees.
